Package org.threadly.concurrent.event

Tools to help build architectures that are event driven and callback based.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncCallListenerHelper<T>
    This class changes the behavior of how listeners are called from the parent class ListenerHelper.
    AsyncCallRunnableListenerHelper
    This class changes the behavior of how listeners are called from the parent class RunnableListenerHelper.
    DefaultExecutorListenerHelper<T>
    This class ensures that listener execution will never happen on the thread that invokes .call().
    DefaultExecutorRunnableListenerHelper
    This class ensures that listener execution will never happen on the thread that invokes .callListeners().
    ListenerHelper<T>
    Class which assist with holding and calling to listeners of any interface.
    RunnableListenerHelper
    Class which assist with holding and calling to Runnable listeners.

Package org.threadly.concurrent.event Description

Tools to help build architectures that are event driven and callback based.
